com.mapbox.services.api.directions.v5.models

Class StepManeuver

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.mapbox.services.api.directions.v5.models.StepManeuver

  • public class StepManeuver
extends Object
    Gives maneuver information about one LegStep.
    Since:
    1.0.0

      • getType

        public String getType()
        This indicates the type of maneuver. It can be any of these listed:
        • turn - a basic turn into direction of the modifier
        • new name - the road name changes (after a mandatory turn)
        • depart - indicates departure from a leg
        • arrive - indicates arrival to a destination of a leg
        • merge - merge onto a street
        • ramp - take a ramp
        • fork
        • end of road - road ends in a T intersection
        • continue - continue on a street after a turn
        • roundabout - traverse roundabout
        Returns:
        String with type of maneuver.
        Since:
        1.0.0

      • setType

        public void setType(String type)
        This indicates the type of maneuver. See the full list of types in getType().
        Parameters:
        type - a String with type of maneuver.
        Since:
        2.1.0

      • getExit

        public Integer getExit()
        An optional integer indicating number of the exit to take. If exit is undefined the destination is on the roundabout. The property exists for the following type properties:

        else - indicates the number of intersections passed until the turn. roundabout - traverse roundabout rotary - a traffic circle

        Returns:
        String of an integer indicating number of the exit to take.
        Since:
        2.0.0

      • setExit

        public void setExit(Integer exit)
        An optional integer indicating number of the exit to take. If exit is undefined the destination is on the roundabout. The property exists for the following type properties:

        else - indicates the number of intersections passed until the turn. roundabout - traverse roundabout rotary - a traffic circle

        Parameters:
        exit - a String of an integer indicating number of the exit to take.
        Since:
        2.1.0

      • getModifier

        public String getModifier()
        This indicates the mode of the maneuver. If type is of turn, the modifier indicates the change in direction accomplished through the turn. If the type is of depart/arrive, the modifier indicates the position of waypoint from the current direction of travel.
        Returns:
        String with modifier.
        Since:
        1.0.0

      • setModifier

        public void setModifier(String modifier)
        This indicates the mode of the maneuver. If type is of turn, the modifier indicates the change in direction accomplished through the turn. If the type is of depart/arrive, the modifier indicates the position of waypoint from the current direction of travel.
        Parameters:
        modifier - a String with the modifier.
        Since:
        2.1.0

      • getInstruction

        public String getInstruction()
        A human-readable instruction of how to execute the returned maneuver.
        Returns:
        String with instruction.
        Since:
        1.0.0

      • setInstruction

        public void setInstruction(String instruction)
        A human-readable instruction of how to execute the returned maneuver.
        Parameters:
        instruction - a String with instruction representing how to execute the maneuver.
        Since:
        2.1.0

      • asPosition

        public com.mapbox.services.commons.models.Position asPosition()
